akas: El asesino de al lado Spain
akas from release info: El asesino de al lado Spain

1.title: The Key to Murder
1.plot: In Rock Hill, S.C., former homecoming queen Melinda Snyder's murder embroils the town in a mystery that won't be settled until the South Carolina Supreme Court weighs in.

2.title: The Unwelcome Wagon
2.plot: When Staff Sgt. Michael Severance goes AWOL the community of San Angelo rallies around his new bride. But there is something more sinister behind his disappearance, and investigators uncover a saga of treachery and passion as big as the state of Texas.

3.title: Dear Katherine, It's Me the Killer
3.plot: When 18-year-old freshman Katherine Foster goes missing, terror strikes the heart of the University of South Alabama. Has she been abducted? Raped? Is there a killer in their midst? Rumors fly, as students fear the worst ... anyone could be next.

4.title: Criss-Cross Killer
4.plot: When Veronica Bozza's body is found bleeding on her living room floor, it sends shockwaves through the close-knit community of Bridgewater. The murder plot leads Nashville's finest to uncover a bizarre unexpected twist right out of a Hollywood movie.

5.title: Death Takes a Toll
5.plot: 39-year-old, Michael Zammitti, Jr., has it all: a loving family, a thriving business, and a comfortable home. But when that life is shattered, police must untangle a web of corruption and lies that will rock two small New England towns to their core.

6.title: Sex, Money and Murder
6.plot: Lance Herndon was living the American dream in Roswell GA, until the millionaire is found brutally murdered. While this upper class town is reeling from the vicious killing, behind the gates of their upscale communities - investigators find a twisted web

7.title: The Art of Murder
7.plot: When Shelley Nance is found stabbed to death, the shocking murder sends the community of Lake Highlands, TX into a panic. Friends are stunned as police zero in on her closest friends. What they uncover is jealousy, hate, and a bizarre fatal attraction.

8.title: Everyone Has a Motive
8.plot: When John Kowalczyk is shot dead, rumors fly in the quiet town of Vienna, VA. Friends can't imagine who would murder the successful entrepreneur. But as police look into John's inner circle, a web of suspects emerges that has the whole town on edge.

9.title: Only the Good
9.plot: In suburban Tennessee, Jimmy McClain is living a good life as a teacher and coach at a local high school. But early one February morning, police find him murdered in his home. With a long list of suspects, whose motive is strong enough to want him dead?

10.title: A Strange Trust
10.plot: Rumors fly when 16-year-old best friends Dawn Donaldson and Chrissy Campbell vanish overnight.

1.title: Death in Robert's Court
1.plot: In Portsmouth, VA, a father comes home to find his 16-year-old daughter stabbed to death. With DNA and fingerprints police hope for an open and shut case. However, the case still goes unsolved for months until a piece of gum points to an unlikely suspect.

2.title: The Truett Street Massacre
2.plot: When Austin York, Matt Self, Mark Barbosa, and Rosa Barbosa are found dead in a McKinney, Texas home, detectives embark on a three year investigation. And just when it seems like the murders may never be solved, an eyewitness breaks the case wide open.

3.title: Killer on South 1200 West
3.plot: Karin Strom is discovered strangled to death in her home. When a suspect emerges, investigators don't have enough evidence for a conviction. It will take twenty-six years to ultimately prove their case, and the final outcome surprises everyone.

4.title: North Main Street Mystery
4.plot: Ann Branson is found stabbed and beaten to death in her Kentucky home. There is little evidence at the crime scene and investigators struggle to find a motive. Ann's financial records provide the break authorities need to help catch the killer overseas.

5.title: Death on Lake Lynn Drive
5.plot: 23-year-old Stephanie Bennett is brutally raped and murdered in her suburban Raleigh apartment. Investigators work the case for years but their leads go nowhere. A closer look at a peeping tom provides police the break they desperately need.

6.title: Murder on Hagadom Hill Road
6.plot: Michele Harris disappears on September 11, 2001. Would she really leave behind her children and run away from her soured marriage? When blood splatters are found in the home, police begin to suspect that Michele may have met a more sinister end.

7.title: Murderer in the Midst
7.plot: When a Korean-American family is terrorized in their suburban home, only three survive. Local Investigators wonder if this is a robbery gone wrong or something more. As the case unfolds, police are shocked to learn of the betrayal behind the murder.

8.title: Murder on Main Street
8.plot: Bloomsbury is the epitome of small-town America. When Monica Massaro is found viciously murdered in her home, it rocks this town to its core. A tipcomes in from 300 miles away to help police hunt down the killer, and the results leave residents shaken.

9.title: Co-Ed Confidential
9.plot: 22-year-old Katie Sepich disappears one night only to be found raped and murdered in a land fill the next morning. It's a case that leads detectives from the victim's inner circle to a potential serial killer and then back to their own front door.

10.title: Sea of Hate
10.plot: When Norma Rodriguez's murder hits the town of Port Hueneme, police are left sorting out suspects in its wake. It will take a capricious witness and 10 years to clean up the damage. When the dust finally settles no one is more suprised than the killer.

11.title: Death in Santa Barbara
11.plot: When 27-year-old, Jarrod Davidson, is shot in the doorway of his Santa Barbara apartment, the neighborhood fears there's an assassin on the loose. As detectives dig deeper into Jarrod's past, they find out this boy got mixed up with the wrong crowd.

12.title: No Safe Harbor
12.plot: When Nikki Halpin, is beaten to death in her home, the residents of Safety Harbor, FL are terrified that a violent intruder is on the loose. But when a mysterious voice on the 911 recording reveals an eerie clue, detectives zero in on an unlikely suspect.

13.title: Skeletons in the Closet
13.plot: When 18 year-old Brittany Loritts is murdered in her North Carolina home, investigators are at a loss as to who would commit such a crime. The case gets hot when investigators find that this family home is built on buried secrets.

14.title: Fallen Angel
14.plot: When Dawnia Dacosta meets a hellish end, residents of Broward County, Florida are puzzled. Who would want to kill such an angelic young woman? Detectives are stumped until "divine intervention" strikes and luck leads them to a killer with evil intentions.

15.title: Death in the Family
15.plot: When 56-year-old David Lunz is gunned down in his Palm Harbor, Florida home, this laid back community fears the worst. It takes investigators more than two years and a surprise clue found 600 miles from the crime scene to nail a killer from David's past.

16.title: Heartless in the Heartland
16.plot: The tiny town of Boonville, Missouri is devastated when the body of eight-year-old Alyssa Owen is found near a rural country road. When another body turns up six weeks later, investigators soon learn that the senseless brutality of this double homicide.

17.title: Conspiracy of Evil
17.plot: Grosse Pointe, Michigan is a privileged community untouched by homicide in over 60 years. So when Barbara Iske is found murdered in the driveway of a local home, the village is shocked. Police use the little evidence they have to catch the killer.

18.title: Midwestern Malice
18.plot: A small town is jolted awake when 31 year old Laura Wynn is found dead in her home. And when a double homicide hits a nearby town, people are terrified. Thirteen years later their fears are confirmed when DNA proves the killer lives among them.confir

1.title: Recipe for Murder
1.plot: When the body of 18-year-old Breanna Schneller is discovered in her apartment, the residents of tranquil Wausau, Wisconsin are stunned. Police hope a cell phone and surveillance videos can help them unravel the mystery surrounding Breanna's death.

2.title: House of Horror
2.plot: Beth Grosskopf was an average resident of an average, quiet little town of Freedom, PA. Grosskopf, a department store employee who was well-liked by fellow workers and customers, had recently deposited $31,000 into her bank account from the sale of some family property. Police theorized money was the motive for the crime: her violent murder. Was it her over-bearing boyfriend? Her live-in renter? Or someone else? Who could hate her enough to stab her 31 times in her own home?

3.title: Trouble in Tulsa
3.plot: When Jerry Martin is found brutally murdered in 1975, the city of Tulsa is left in fear. And with no solid leads, ignorance as well. It takes detectives more than 25 years and new DNA evidence more than 1000 miles away to warm up this cold case.

4.title: The Lady Killer
4.plot: Jason is an ex boyfriend who is found innocent in the trial of his girlfriend's disappearance in Maine.

5.title: Deadly Disloyalty
5.plot: The residents of Navasota, Texas are horrified when one of the pillars of their community, 54 year-old Lonnie Turner Sr., is found shot dead in his home. As investigators dig into the case, they discover this brutal murder may be a family affair.

6.title: Road to Hell
6.plot: The gruesome slaying of adored resident Debra Rawls leaves the town of Summerfield paralyzed in fear. A swath of hooligans quickly deepens the suspect pool, but a speck of blood makes the biggest splash in discovering the true identity of the killer.

7.title: Burning Secret
7.plot: When Goshen, New Hampshire resident Edith "Pen" Meyer goes missing, the tiny vacation town fears the worst. Police find leads, but can't find Pen's body. When a notorious resident reveals a grudge, police move in quickly to catch a killer.

8.title: New England Nightmare
8.plot: When Joanne Presti and her young daughter, Alyssa, are found slain in their Woburn, Massachusetts home, police sift through exes and neighbors to nab their murderer. But when a mysterious photograph is found in the Presti home, a killer is exposed.

9.title: Murder 101
9.plot: Residents are struck with fear when the strangled body of 21-year-old Susan Schumake is found in Carbondale, Illinois. Lack of evidence stumps cops for more than two decades, but new technology leads detectives in a direction they never expected.

10.title: Flames of Passion
10.plot: The discovery of Troy Temar's charred remains in Lebanon Ohio rattles the nerves of its residents. Police are led astray for 6 years until an accomplice Â's confession exposes a sinister plot orchestrated by a devious killer linked to Troy's past.

11.title: Little Girl Lost
11.plot: When nine-year old Cyndi Allinger doesn't show up for dinner, her mom fears the worst. Is someone stalking the school-age citizens of scenic Lakewood, Washington? The most likely tip comes from the least likely witnesses, and leads to Cyndi's killer.

12.title: Double Murder Inferno
12.plot: Shoreline, WA is shattered when Renee Powell is murdered and her home set afire. When this predator strikes again, police fear they have a serial killer on their hands. But the trail grows cold and it takes a jilted lover to shake this case loose.

13.title: One Deadly Night
13.plot: The gruesome discovery of 24-year old Zilpha Lowery's body has folks in Marion, NC baffled. It's a frustrating case that sets police off on a wild ride through the victim's past until a decade old lead helps police catch a killer.

14.title: Writing on the Wall
14.plot: The brutal slaying of 32-year-old Stacie Ann Smith, a single mother, has the townsfolk of St.Albans, West Virginia reeling. The murderer's message at the crime scene baffles investigators and citizens are shocked that a killer lives in their midst.

15.title: Big Sky Burning
15.plot: When Norm Leighton and Patti Hubbert, a peaceful older couple, is violently murdered, locals fear quiet Billings, Montana is turning into the Wild West. And when the couple's neighbor turns up dead, police are off on a wild ride to solve the case.

16.title: Newlywed Nightmare
16.plot: Roland was invited to a party by newlyweds Bev and Brian.

17.title: Hands of Betrayal
17.plot: 84-year-old Charles Taylor's grisly murder has the entire city of Warren, Michigan in disarray. Investigators are taken on a wild ride and are forced to eliminate a swath of suspects, only to be stunned by the true identity of a callous murderer.

18.title: Heartland Homicide
18.plot: After beloved custodian James Mayberry is found stabbed to death in his Wichita home, the folks of the Midwestern town are in shock. Detectives are stumped until a break comes faster than a prairie tornado that pins down the heartless killer.

19.title: Deadly Dealings
19.plot: The quiet town of Tomahawk is rocked when long time resident 42-year-old Tracy Maurer is found brutally stabbed to death in her home. Police have a laundry list of suspects but it's a tip from the rumor mill that finally brings closure to the case.

20.title: Death Down on the Farm
20.plot: A community's worst fears are realized when the body of 25-year-old Holly Notestine is found deep in a Clearville, Pennsylvania logging forest. After years of fuzzy clues and dead-end tips cops nab a ruthless killer lurking just around the corner.

21.title: Silent Night, Violent Night
21.plot: In 2006, Christmas cheer hits an all-time low in Hubbardston, MI when 80-year-old Billie Cunningham is found murdered in her home. Years pass as police search for a vicious killer. But it turns out the shocking confession is well worth the wait.

22.title: Devils in the Details
22.plot: The savage murder of single mother Cindy Pavey rattles the tranquil town of Murphysboro, Illinois. Police investigate a potentially deadly love triangle, but it will take over a decade to harvest the leads necessary to bring her killer to justice.

1.title: Murder on the Menu
1.plot: When friendly cashier Tammy Petrin is found shot execution style at the local burger joint, the town of Woonsocket's in shock. After lead suspects don't serve up answers, a helpful hooker and letters from jail might be just what detectives ordered.

2.title: Prescription for Murder
2.plot: When 56-year-old David Lunz is gunned down in his Palm Harbor, Florida home, this laid back community fears the worst. It takes investigators more than two years and a surprise clue found 600 miles from the crime scene to nail a killer from David's past.

3.title: Dead of the Night
3.plot: On April 15, 2004 residents of Riverton, WY are worried about more than the IRS after the brutal murder of prison nurse, Tammy Watts. Police begin an all out manhunt for the killer and it takes a hair-raising discovery for them to nab their guy.

4.title: Wrong Way Home
4.plot: When 12-year-old Michelle Winter goes missing without a trace, her family doesn't have a clue as to who could have whisked this pre-teen away. Cops have many leads, but it isn't until evidence is linked to the killer that they get their big break.

5.title: Deadly Intentions
5.plot: A tight-knit community is stunned when the body of Cynthia Epps is found stuffed into a cabinet in her Buffalo, NY neighborhood. A clever killer eludes capture for nearly two decades but new technology and dogged detective work put him behind bars.

6.title: Taste of Murder
6.plot: When a sip from the office water cooler turns deadly for secretary Julie Williams, detectives are stumped. Who could have had it out for this sweet single mom? Investigators search for the mystery mixologist and are shocked at who they stir up.

7.title: Last Call
7.plot: In late 2007 Jasper, Texas native Martin Byerly disappears without a trace. Police look into the 58-year-old ladies man's dance card but can't seem to pin anything on a femme fatal. Then an unlikely tipster helps them learn what happened to Martin.

8.title: Innocence Lost
8.plot: In 1995, Portage, IN, Sarah Paulsen, 8, is found assaulted and murdered. After several leads, police in the close knit town are stymied. Could a tipster's call, odd confessions, or an original suspect be the culprit?

9.title: Devil in the Desert
9.plot: When single gal Adele Curtis meets a terrible end in her Phoenix rental property, detectives delve into a series of suspects to find the killer. But when the search goes cold as a desert night, it takes the dawn of DNA to catch this murderer.

10.title: Dead End
10.plot: When a ten year-old boy makes a quick run to the store, he runs into a nightmare instead. A strange slew of suspects pops out of the woodwork, but when police zero in on the bad guy, his motive is more shocking than anyone can imagine.

11.title: Million Dollar Murder
11.plot: On May 22, 2004 Baton Rouge millionaire Alan Waters is found shot to death inside his mansion. Police think his real estate business is to blame but they can't solve this deadly puzzle until someone close to Alan comes forward with the missing piece.

12.title: Cruel Intentions
12.plot: In Lanett, AL, things just aren't adding up when a beloved former teacher, and mayor's wife, is found dead in her home. Friends try to put two and two together, but they come up with zero reasons anyone would want her dead, and police are just as stymied.

13.title: Texas Terror
13.plot: When thirteen-year-old Texas City girl Krystal Baker is found dead off the banks of the Galveston Bay, investigators round up a herd of suspects. But with little physical evidence on the scene, it takes a dedicated detective to solve this case.

14.title: Out of the Past
14.plot: When teen Sherita Williams meets an untimely death after a quick trip to the nail salon everyone in Pennsauken, New Jersey is shocked. Police dig up a cast of potential villains but when the true killer appears, they find he's in a class all his own.

15.title: Country Killing
15.plot: In early fall of 1992, the rural community of Wantage, New Jersey is rocked by the murder of beloved local Christine Schurman. Police are at a loss for suspects until a tip about another murder committed in Missouri connects them to their killer.

16.title: Drink with the Devil
16.plot: When single mom Mary Stetson goes out to her favorite haunt, she ends up in a house of horrors. The folks of Manchester, New Hampshire are shocked by her brutal murder. But only a tip from a mystery woman reveals Mary's killer.

17.title: Murders Under the Mistletoe
17.plot: Holiday cheer ends in holiday fear, when Jean Wholaver and her two daughters are murdered in their home on Christmas Eve. Detectives in Middletown, Pennsylvania check their list of suspects twice and are shocked by the killer's true identity.

18.title: The Ties That Bind
18.plot: When the lifeless body of Christian Rojas is found battered, his friends in Bensalem, PA are beside themselves with fear. Detectives are on the hunt for a savage killer but are surprised that it's one of Christian's friends that has become a murderous foe

19.title: Where There's Smoke
19.plot: Joliet, Illinois fire fighters are shocked to find 28-year-old Melissa Plut strangled to death when they respond to a fire in her duplex. Police search the nurse's love life with no luck until a 9-1-1 call unmasks her killer hiding in plain sight.

20.title: Murder in Paradise
20.plot: When pretty Nags Head tourist Janet Siclari turns up dead on the beach outside her hotel, the fun comes to an end. When a hurricane blows leads out of town, police wonder if the killer escaped too. Only time can help detectives catch the culprit.

1.title: Stealing Beauty
1.plot: When high school sophomore Kiplyn Davis never returns home after school, police suspect foul play. Investigators search her hometown for clues, but are met with little success. After years go by without any answers, dark secrets begin to be revealed..

2.title: Trouble in Coal Country
2.plot: A cold case involving the disappearance of a 13-year-old paperboy is reopened due to new evidence.

3.title: Deadly Deception
3.plot: When 19-year old Danielle Davis is found dead in her college apartment, strangled with the cord from her laptop, Statesboro, Georgia police know they'd better be quick and find this co-ed's killer. When they discover you can't judge a book by its cover.

4.title: Jack Be Deadly
4.plot: Normal life in the quiet city of East Point, GA comes to a screeching halt when six people become random targets of a mysterious gunman. While police work round the clock to try and catch the killer, locals hunker down in horror wondering who's next?

5.title: Nightmare Over the Rainbow
5.plot: Before single mom Lori Leonard settles into her upstate New York home, she vanishes without a trace and detectives don't know if she's dead or alive. Only when a couple of Average Joes make an extraordinary catch do they reel in the shark who did Lori in.

6.title: Murder at Sunrise
6.plot: When Kathryn Hauser is brutally murdered in her home, the residents of a posh Albuquerque neighborhood are stricken with fear. Police receive numerous tips, but it's a pair of shoeprints that leads them to a criminal who's stayed a step ahead of the law.

7.title: Mile High Murder Mystery
7.plot: Terence George is found shot to death in his own apartment and police are desperate to find answers. Terence's fiancÃ©e Tiffany Durst is nowhere to be found, leading investigators to dig into the young woman's rocky past.

8.title: Gone
8.plot: In Stockton, California, 18-year old Jessyca Arro meets a dark fate. The twists and turns in the case keep this killer one step ahead until one last clue leads detectives to the mother lode.

9.title: Lone Star Mystery
9.plot: The crime rate in rural Royse City, TX is almost non-existent. So when quiet couple Dennis and Norma Woodruff is found murdered in their own home, it sends shock waves through town. As police investigate, it seems the killings...are a family affair.

10.title: Fallen Starr
10.plot: When beloved wife and mother Starr Harris is savagely murdered in the woods behind her home, the trees hide more than just the killer's identity. The cold-blooded killing rocks tiny Drummonds, TN, but soon determined cops uncover a smoking gun.

11.title: Thanksgiving Tragedy
11.plot: Chris Mader is shot to death on Thanksgiving eve. Many years later investigators are lead to an unlikely informant.

12.title: Highway to Hell
12.plot: An 18-year-old woman goes missing while traveling through Wyoming and the search leads to her body, and a sinister secret.

13.title: Madison Murder Mystery
13.plot: Everyone in Madison, WI is shocked when Joel Marino is stabbed to death in broad daylight. No one can imagine who'd want to do in this sociable salesman, and the predator seems one step ahead of police until an unexpected twist leads to capture.

14.title: The Art of Murder
14.plot: As 22 year old Kristin Huggins is about to make her artistic debut she suddenly disappears. Soon its clear that the painter from PA had a brush with disaster in nearby NJ. Despite their best efforts, it takes cops quite some time to catch her killer.

15.title: Small Town Secret
15.plot: When young Kari Nixon goes missing while on a snack run, no one in her upstate New York town can imagine why anyone would harm her. With no body and few clues, detectives struggle to solve the mystery until a twist leads police to an unlikely killer.

16.title: Death in the Dark
16.plot: A young Pennsylvania woman is murdered in the basement of her Uncle's home and a house guest is the prime suspect.

17.title: Bloodshed in Biloxi
17.plot: Panic spreads through a Mississippi town when Lynette Jarrett disappears. With no body and little evidence, no one can solve this mystery. Only when a secret is revealed do detectives unravel a tale of deadly obsession that leads them to one greedy guy.

18.title: Murder in the Night
18.plot: Residents in a small town of Pennsylvania, the Haines lived seemingly perfect lives until one night, they are brutally murdered in their sleep. The only survivor is daughter Maggie.

19.title: Death in Daytona
19.plot: Spring break ends in heartbreak when coed Chrissy Lazzaro is gunned down miles from her Daytona Beach hotel. A few hot tips soon peter out and the case goes cold, but a startling change of heart finally brings a heartless killer to justice.

20.title: Memorial Day Murder
20.plot: A dream life ends when pretty mom-to-be Kelsey Monahon is found hogtied and beaten in her beachfront home.At first, the bizarre scene looks like a home invasion, but detectives dig deeper and turn up a trio of unlikely suspects including Kelsey's husband.

1.title: Daylight Abduction
1.plot: On a sunny summer day in Orlando, FL, a city known for theme parks and family fun, a professional woman vanishes in broad daylight. When her naked body is found dumped in the woods days later, detectives jumpstart a manhunt for her depraved killer.

2.title: Risky Business
2.plot: When Bob Eidman is found shot to death in his St. Charles, Mo., office, police discover the insurance agent's secret life leading to a slew of murder suspects.

3.title: The Coldest Case
3.plot: The murder of Christopher Green sends shivers up citizens' spines in the small, snowbound city of Bangor, Mich., and detectives follow the clues down a path to a chilling outcome.

4.title: Left for Dead
4.plot: A mysterious call draws the Sheriff's Office in Orlando, Florida to a young artist's second floor apartment, where she's found brutally beaten. With few clues to investigate, can detectives uncover this shadow in the night before he strikes again?

5.title: Hilltop Horror
5.plot: When 55-year-old Monica Schmeyer is found shot to death in her living room, the peaceful people of Hanover, Pennsylvania are in a state of panic. Investigators have no idea who would want to kill this gentle woman and they have few clues to go on.

6.title: Hair of the Dog
6.plot: In Monrovia, Md., Debbie Fagan is found shot to death in her car, leading detectives to uncover a web of lies and deceit as they dig into her past to find out who would want to murder the loving mother of two.

7.title: Into the Woods
7.plot: In Norris, Ill., Jessica Evans and Jacob Wheeler never return home after going fishing, then Wheeler's abandoned pickup truck is found with a body in its bed.

8.title: Murder in Omaha
8.plot: When Pasinetta Prince is found dead in her home, the close-knit community of North Omaha is left reeling. As police dig deeper into the life of the beautiful starlet, they find a long line of admirers. Could one man's infatuation have turned into murder?

9.title: Master Key Murder
9.plot: The charming town of Macon, GA panics when Mercer Law grad Lauren Giddings is murdered on campus. Detectives uncover multiple suspects with motive and means. But only one person in the group is sadistic enough to kill.

10.title: Bewitching Hour
10.plot: Police search for Kathryn Horn, a missing teen, and uncover an underworld filled with hippies, witches and cults.

11.title: Love Addicted
11.plot: When Diane and Alan Johnson were shot to death in their own home in Bellevue, Idaho, the people in snowy town are panicking.

12.title: Window Peeper
12.plot: When Gary Larson was stabbed to death and his girlfriend was assaulted in their home in Edmond, Oklahoma, the people are shocked.

13.title: Curious Paintball
13.plot: On March 21, 1962, in Hanford, California, a 15-year-old girl named Marlene Miller was murdered in her home.

14.title: Love Triangle
14.plot: When 15-year-old Martha Moxley was beaten to death with a golf club just a few yards from her mansion home in Greenwich, Connecticut, the people in Bell Haven are shocked.

15.title: Roaring House
15.plot: When Christopher Campano's wife Caren goes missing after a heated argument, people suspect foul play in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma.

16.title: Killer Instinct
16.plot: When Eva Schoen was shot to death in her home in Telluride, Colorado, the ski resort town residents are bewildered by the burglary.

17.title: Broken Promises
17.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

18.title: Grudge Bare
18.plot: When 16-year-old Austin High sophomore Christopher "Woody" Briseno was shot to death at a bus stop and his cousin injured, the state capital of Texas was shocked.

19.title: Evil Kin
19.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

20.title: Murder in the Morning
20.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

21.title: Ohio State Sniper
21.plot:
Know what this is about?

22.title: Orange Grove Cruelty

23.title: Money Hunger
23.plot: Lance Herndon was living the American dream in Roswell GA, until the millionaire is found brutally murdered. While this upper class town is reeling from the vicious killing, behind the gates of their upscale communities - investigators find a twisted web

imdb.plot outline: "Nightmare Next Door" tells the tales of mysterious murders that rocked small-town America. Each hour brings you a new murder mystery and a new look into the evil that can lurk in the heart and soul of a tight-knit community. Interviews with investigators, prosecutors, family members and neighbors piece together the twisting tale of a classic whodunit.
imdb.title: Nightmare Next Door
plot: Tells the tales of mysterious murders that rocked small-town America.::Sirens Media

"_Nightmare Next Door_ (qv)" tells the tales of mysterious murders that rocked small-town America. Each hour brings you a new murder mystery and a new look into the evil that can lurk in the heart and soul of a tight-knit community. Interviews with investigators, prosecutors, family members and neighbors piece together the twisting tale of a classic whodunit.::Sirens Media
